segments.text: How much does it cost to rent a mid-size car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can give you one for $ 30 a day or $ 200 a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I'd like to reserve one for next Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see your driver's license ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . You'll have to use a credit card or leave a $ 100 deposit .
segments.speaker: S2
